languages.text: Спустя несколько часов блуждания по мертвым коридорам отряд Енхо Сона и Вольный Торговец достигли мостика "Рожденного в огне". Гнетущее чувство не оставляло их, словно сами стены корабля пропитались ужасом и болью тех, кто бесследно пропал с этих палуб. По пути отряду нигде не встретились ни следы борьбы, ни тела команды — и это лишь сгущало тревогу...

traits.locale_text: Спустя несколько часов блуждания по мертвым коридорам отряд Енхо Сона и Вольный Торговец достигли мостика "Рожденного в огне". Гнетущее чувство не оставляло их, словно сами стены корабля пропитались ужасом и болью тех, кто бесследно пропал с этих палуб.

languages.text: After spending several hours wandering down the dead passageways, Young-ho Sohn's unit and the Rogue Trader reached the bridge of the Fireborn. The oppressive feeling had not dissipated — it was as though the bulkheads of the ship were steeped in the terror and pain of the people who had vanished without a trace from those decks. On their way there, the unit had found no signs of a struggle, or bodies of the crew — and that served only to deepen their unease...
languages.original_text: Спустя несколько часов блуждания по мертвым коридорам отряд Енхо Сона и Вольный Торговец достигли мостика "Рожденного в огне". Гнетущее чувство не оставляло их, словно сами стены корабля пропитались ужасом и болью тех, кто бесследно пропал с этих палуб. По пути отряду нигде не встретились ни следы борьбы, ни тела команды — и это лишь сгущало тревогу...

On their way there, the unit had found no signs of a struggle, or bodies of the crew — and that served only to deepen their unease...

On their way there, the unit had found no signs of a struggle, or bodies of the crew — and that served only to deepen their unease...

After spending several hours wandering down the dead passageways, Young-ho Sohn's unit and the Rogue Trader reached the bridge of the Fireborn. The oppressive feeling had not dissipated — it was as though the bulkheads of the ship were steeped in the terror and pain of the people who had vanished without a trace from those decks. On their way there, the unit had found no signs of a struggle, or bodies of the crew — and that served only to deepen their unease...

languages.text: Tras varias horas recorriendo los pasadizos muertos, la unidad de Young-ho Sohn y {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente llegaron al puente de la Nacida del Fuego. La sensación de opresión seguía presente. Era como si las mamparas de la nave estuvieran cubiertas del terror y el dolor de los que habían desaparecido sin dejar rastro. No habían encontrado señales de lucha ni cadáveres por el camino, lo que solo sirvió para aumentar la tensión...
languages.original_text: After spending several hours wandering down the dead passageways, Young-ho Sohn's unit and the Rogue Trader reached the bridge of the Fireborn. The oppressive feeling had not dissipated — it was as though the bulkheads of the ship were steeped in the terror and pain of the people who had vanished without a trace from those decks. On their way there, the unit had found no signs of a struggle, or bodies of the crew — and that served only to deepen their unease...

traits.locale_text: Tras varias horas recorriendo los pasadizos muertos, la unidad de Young-ho Sohn y {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente llegaron al puente de la Nacida del Fuego. La sensación de opresión seguía presente. Era como si las mamparas de la nave estuvieran cubiertas del terror y el dolor de los que habían desaparecido sin dejar rastro. No habían encontrado señales de lucha ni cadáveres por el camino, lo que solo sirvió para aumentar la tensión...

languages.text: 行商浪人与宋永和的部队在一片死寂的通道上徘徊了几个小时，最终抵达了“烈焰之子”号的舰桥。压抑的感觉并没有消散，仿佛那些从船上凭空消失的人们，他们的恐怖与痛苦早已浸透了这艘飞船的舱壁。在前往舰桥的路上，探索小队并没有发现任何厮打的迹象，也没有发现任何船员的尸体，而这却让队员们感到更加不安……
languages.original_text: After spending several hours wandering down the dead passageways, Young-ho Sohn's unit and the Rogue Trader reached the bridge of the Fireborn. The oppressive feeling had not dissipated — it was as though the bulkheads of the ship were steeped in the terror and pain of the people who had vanished without a trace from those decks. On their way there, the unit had found no signs of a struggle, or bodies of the crew — and that served only to deepen their unease...

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人与宋永和的部队在一片死寂的通道上徘徊了几个小时，最终抵达了“烈焰之子”号的舰桥。压抑的感觉并没有消散，仿佛那些从船上凭空消失的人们，他们的恐怖与痛苦早已浸透了这艘飞船的舱壁。在前往舰桥的路上，探索小队并没有发现任何厮打的迹象，也没有发现任何船员的尸体，而这却让队员们感到更加不安……

languages.text: 死んだ通路を数時間さまよい続けた後、ソン・ヨンホの部隊と自由開拓者は、ファイアボーンのブリッジに到着した。圧迫感は消えていない。あたかもブリッジの隔壁に、デッキから跡形もなく消えた人達の恐怖と痛みが染み込んでいるかのようだ。そこへ向かう途中、部隊は戦闘の痕跡もクルーの死体も発見することはなかったが、その事実は彼らの不安をさらに深めただけだった…
languages.original_text: After spending several hours wandering down the dead passageways, Young-ho Sohn's unit and the Rogue Trader reached the bridge of the Fireborn. The oppressive feeling had not dissipated — it was as though the bulkheads of the ship were steeped in the terror and pain of the people who had vanished without a trace from those decks. On their way there, the unit had found no signs of a struggle, or bodies of the crew — and that served only to deepen their unease...

traits.locale_text: 死んだ通路を数時間さまよい続けた後、ソン・ヨンホの部隊と自由開拓者は、ファイアボーンのブリッジに到着した。圧迫感は消えていない。あたかもブリッジの隔壁に、デッキから跡形もなく消えた人達の恐怖と痛みが染み込んでいるかのようだ。そこへ向かう途中、部隊は戦闘の痕跡もクルーの死体も発見することはなかったが、その事実は彼らの不安をさらに深めただけだった…

languages.text: Nach mehreren Stunden in toten Gängen erreichten Young-ho Sohns Einheit und {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} die Brücke der Fireborn. Das unangenehme Gefühl war nicht verschwunden – als wären die Schotten des Schiffs getränkt mit der Angst und dem Schmerz der Leute, die spurlos von diesen Decks verschwunden waren. Auf ihrem Weg hatte die Einheit keine Spuren eines Kampfes oder Leichen der Crew gefunden – und das verstärkte ihre Beunruhigung noch noch weiter ...
languages.original_text: After spending several hours wandering down the dead passageways, Young-ho Sohn's unit and the Rogue Trader reached the bridge of the Fireborn. The oppressive feeling had not dissipated — it was as though the bulkheads of the ship were steeped in the terror and pain of the people who had vanished without a trace from those decks. On their way there, the unit had found no signs of a struggle, or bodies of the crew — and that served only to deepen their unease...

traits.locale_text: Nach mehreren Stunden in toten Gängen erreichten Young-ho Sohns Einheit und {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} die Brücke der Fireborn. Das unangenehme Gefühl war nicht verschwunden – als wären die Schotten des Schiffs getränkt mit der Angst und dem Schmerz der Leute, die spurlos von diesen Decks verschwunden waren. Auf ihrem Weg hatte die Einheit keine Spuren eines Kampfes oder Leichen der Crew gefunden – und das verstärkte ihre Beunruhigung noch noch weiter ...

languages.text: Après avoir erré pendant plusieurs heures dans les couloirs déserts, l'unité de Young-ho Sohn et {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} arrivèrent sur la passerelle du Flamboyant. La sensation oppressante les accompagnait toujours, comme si les cloisons du vaisseau étaient imprégnées de la terreur et de la douleur des passagers qui avaient disparu sans laisser de trace. En chemin, ils n'avaient trouvé aucun signe de lutte ni le moindre cadavre, ce qui n'avait fait que renforcer leur appréhension...
languages.original_text: After spending several hours wandering down the dead passageways, Young-ho Sohn's unit and the Rogue Trader reached the bridge of the Fireborn. The oppressive feeling had not dissipated — it was as though the bulkheads of the ship were steeped in the terror and pain of the people who had vanished without a trace from those decks. On their way there, the unit had found no signs of a struggle, or bodies of the crew — and that served only to deepen their unease...

traits.locale_text: Après avoir erré pendant plusieurs heures dans les couloirs déserts, l'unité de Young-ho Sohn et {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} arrivèrent sur la passerelle du Flamboyant. La sensation oppressante les accompagnait toujours, comme si les cloisons du vaisseau étaient imprégnées de la terreur et de la douleur des passagers qui avaient disparu sans laisser de trace. En chemin, ils n'avaient trouvé aucun signe de lutte ni le moindre cadavre, ce qui n'avait fait que renforcer leur appréhension...

languages.text: Ölü geçitleri arşınlamaya saatler harcayan Hür Tacir ve Young-ho Sohn'un birimi, Ateşten'in köprüsüne ulaşmayı başardı. Yüreklere ağırlık veren his ise varlığını hissettirmeye devam ediyordu. Bölme panelleri, ardında en ufak bir iz bırakmadan hiçliğe karışan insanların dehşetini ve acısını yansıtıyordu sanki. Birim, yol boyunca ne mücadele izlerine ne de mürettebatın cesetlerine rastladı. Bu durum yüreklerine su serpmedi, aksine tedirginliklerini artırdı.
languages.original_text: After spending several hours wandering down the dead passageways, Young-ho Sohn's unit and the Rogue Trader reached the bridge of the Fireborn. The oppressive feeling had not dissipated — it was as though the bulkheads of the ship were steeped in the terror and pain of the people who had vanished without a trace from those decks. On their way there, the unit had found no signs of a struggle, or bodies of the crew — and that served only to deepen their unease...

traits.locale_text: Ölü geçitleri arşınlayarak birkaç saat geçiren Hür Tacir ve Young-ho Sohn'un birimi, Ateşten'in köprüsüne ulaşmayı başardı. Yüreklere ağırlık veren his ise varlığını hissettirmeye devam ediyordu. Bölme panelleri, ardında en ufak bir iz bırakmadan hiçliğe karışan insanların dehşetini ve acısını yansıtıyordu sanki. Birim, yol boyunca ne mücadele izlerine ne de mürettebatın cesetlerine rastladı. Bu durum yüreklerine su serpmedi, aksine tedirginliklerini artırdı.
